body: Pye Corner Audio – Perfect Secrecy Forever Audio have been making incredible records at an astounding rate for a few years now and I recommend every single one. This is from a recent split album and is classic Italo-themed psychedelic electronic music.             Sheer Mag – Fan the Flames   I finally saw this band at SXSW and they were incredible. All my friends in Glasgow got me into this record, it’s loud and catchy. I can see them doing really well. Every song sounds like a hit.              Lubomyr Melnyk – Parasol   Every record I hear on Erased Tapes is tremendous but this might be the best of them all. Very unique solo piano music. Incredibly soulful and beautiful.             Mdou Moctar – Tahoultine I first heard this guy on the incredible Music from Saharan Cellphones compilation and he blew me away. I saw him play last year and was mesmerising. A total rock star.             Minor Victories’ self-titled album will be released through Play It Again Sam on 3 June
webTitle: Mogwai’s Stuart Braithwaite's playlist: Sheer Mag, Mdou Moctar and more
